casebody.data:
State
v.
Alonzo Antonio Murrell 233PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 16, 2016 James W. Carter, Attorney at Law, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Daniel Lawrence Spiegel, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Murrell, Alonzo Antonio. Oliver G. Wheeler, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of December 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of December 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 9th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
